LicenseFile.Description: The path to the Sitecore license file.

SitecoreContentManagementSiteName.Description: The name of the content management site to be deployed.

SitecoreContentDeliverySiteName.Description: The name of the content delivery site to be deployed.

SitecoreAdminPassword.Description: The admin password for the Sitecore instance.

SiteRoot.Description: Root folder to install the site to. If left on the default [systemdrive]:\inetpub\wwwroot will be used.

SqlAdminUser.Description: The Sql admin user account to use when installing databases.

SqlAdminPassword.Description: The Sql admin password to use when installing databases.

SQLServer.Description: The Sql Server where databases will be installed.

SqlFormsPassword.Description: The Sql password for the Experience Forms connection string in Sitecore.

SqlSecurityPassword.Description: The Sql password for the Security connection string in Sitecore.

SqlCorePassword.Description: The Sql password for the Core connection string in Sitecore.

SqlMasterPassword.Description: The Sql password for the Master connection string in Sitecore.

SqlWebPassword.Description: The Sql password for the Web connection string in Sitecore.

SolrRoot.Description: The file path to the Solr instance.

SolrService.Description: The name of the Solr service.

SitecoreContentManagementPackage.Description: The path to the Sitecore package to deploy.

SitecoreContentDeliveryPackage.Description: The path to the Sitecore package to deploy.

IdentityServerPackage.Description: The path to the Identity Server package to deploy.

PasswordRecoveryUrl.Description: Password recovery Url (Host name of CM instance).

AllowedCorsOrigins.Description: Pipe-separated list of instances (URIs) that are allowed to login via Sitecore Identity.

ClientSecret.Description: Client secret of PasswordClient section. It's a random string between 1 and 100 symbols long.

PackagesTempLocation.Description: Alternative location to save WDP packages. If left on the default $Env:Temp will be used.

DownloadLocations.Description: File with URI and SHA256 hashes of dynamically downloadable WDPs.

DisableHttpsForCD.Description: The option for the enable/disable HTTPS to the Sitecore Content Delivery.

Update.Description: The parameter for the installing delta WDP packages.
